query:

\[\left\{\begin{array}{l}
    -2x_1+x_2+ax_3-5x_4=1, \\
    x_1+x_2-x_3+bx_4=4, \\
   3x_1+x_2+x_3+2x_4=c
  \end{array}\right.
\]
and the linear equations
\[\left\{\begin{array}{l}
    x_1+x_4=1, \\
    x_2-2x_4=2, \\
   x_3+x_4=-1.
  \end{array}\right.
\]
have the same set of solutions. Present the answer as $[a,b,c]$.
